definition: a wrecked ship (or a part of one), destroy a ship
details:
noun
- a wrecked ship (or a part of one)
- an accident that destroys a ship at sea
= synonyms: wreck
- an irretrievable loss
= example: an irretrievable loss
verb
- destroy a ship
= example: destroy a ship
- cause to experience shipwreck
= example: cause to experience shipwreck
- suffer failure, as in some enterprise
- ruin utterly
= example: ruin utterly
